ModMetaData.name: Angel Race
ModMetaData.author: Ogam, ILuvSilicon
ModMetaData.description: Adds Angels as a race into rimworld. A member of a heavenly host, either fallen or sent here for divine purpose, most will refuse to clarify any further. Inhuman in every way, from beauty to precision. Having one of these in your colony is a boon beyond boons. Race Features and content -Angels are stronger overall than normal pawns by about 30% -The 3 angelic armors are similar in power to the various power armors in the game, but they are more beautiful. -currently 2 types of Angels, normal (white wings) and, Death (spirit wings). More to come. - 3 sets of armor and 3 weapons to match each set. All on par with the various high tech end game gear.
